properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 12:56PM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Northern Lake County, including Alkali Lake, Fort Rock,
Christmas Valley, Highway 395 north of Abert Lake, Highway 31
between Summer Lake and Silver Lake, and Highway 20.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down, and low visibilities are possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow is expected during this time,
and combined with the wind, may result in periods significantly
reduced visibility due to blowing and drifting snow.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
